text: @senatemajldr Bc of trump’s premature irresponsible opening of the USA, Covid-19  is on the rise throughout the country. Americans cannot go back to work; they must stay home to slow the spread of Covid-19. The Senate MUST PASS FINANCIAL AID FOR THE THOUSANDS UNEMPLOYED
